meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by flexography.
meanings.sent1: The flexographically printed labels were vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The packaging was designed with a flexographically printed logo.
meanings.sent3: The flexographically decorated cake looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was as colorful and detailed as a flexographically printed poster.
meanings.sent5: The flexographically designed banners fluttered in the wind, attracting attention.

meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of flexography.
meanings.sent1: She applied the ink flexographically, ensuring even coverage.
meanings.sent2: The labels were printed flexographically for a professional finish.
meanings.sent3: He danced flexographically around the room, mimicking the printing process.
meanings.sent4: The colors blended together flexographically, creating a seamless design.
meanings.sent5: The machine operated flexographically, producing consistent results every time.
